// App Wide Version 0.01 beta SSA Settings Smart Safety Alert Ride Safer Technologies by // User Manual User_Manual_Activity User Manual // About Screen SSA Status Bluetooth: Connected Disconnected Child in Car-Seat: In Seat Not In Seat Temperature Threshold: Within Threshold Threshold Surpassed Battery Status: The Smart Safety Alert (SSA) system will alert you when you disconnect or are disconnected from your SSA hardware via Bluetooth while a child is still detected in the car-seat. Use the options under the Settings in the menu to configure the SSA system. // Team Created by: Albert Vintayen Curtis McLaws Ryan Mainard Victoria Cizevska New message: %1$s Lorem ipsum Share Reply Close "Persistent ": %1$s This will keep the SSA Application running so you don\'t forget your child. // URL file:///android_asset/UserManual.html // Alerts and Notifications Bluetooth Verification The Bluetooth is turned off. The SSA App requires that this be turned on in order to function properly. Open Settings Cancel Dismiss Snooze Full_Screen_White Full_Screen_Black Full_Screen_Alarm Hello world!
SSA_Dialog_Alert Alert! Your \nChild is Still \nIn The Car!
